docs.text: chtk Purpose chtk is short for "Clone Hero Toolkit." It is a suite of data science tools that are useful for working with Clone Hero data. Features Getting Started chtk can be installed using pip pip install chtk Usage TODO Examples TODO API Contribution TODO Author TODO
